description.narrative: The Project is to (i) rehabilitate the Mazar-e-Sharif - Dara-i-Suf road (140.3 kilometers [km]) and the Bamian-Yakawlang road (98.9 km), (ii) install cross-border facilities in Spin Boldak, (iii) support campaigns to prevent HIV/AIDS and increase awareness of human trafficking; (iv) provide support for project management and monitoring, and (v) provide project management support to the Ministry of Public Works (MPW).

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved road transport services in the project areas

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
A 50% decrease in travel time on the project roads for all types of vehicles immediately after project completion

description.narrative: Improved road transport services in the project areas

title.narrative: An average 30% reduction in travel time to the nearest health, primary education, and other essential services from the project areas within 3 months of project completion

description.narrative: Improved road transport services in the project areas

title.narrative: A 20% decrease in freight and passenger transport fares passing through the project roads within 1 year of project completion

description.narrative: Improved road transport services in the project areas

title.narrative: A 10% increase per annum in freight and passenger traffic on the project roads for 3 years after project completion.

description.narrative: Improved road transport services in the project areas
